item.title: 数据排除大幅降息可能，国债收益率大幅上升
item.description: 美国经济数据表现强劲，促使交易商降低了对美联储今年积极降息的预期，美国国债收益率随之飙升。【原文：US Treasury yields surged after resilient US economic data prompted traders to lower their expectations of aggressive Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 荷兰 NN 保险公司认为日本销售疲软将持续到 2025 年
item.description: NN Group NV 预计，在日本当地业务受到监管措施打击后，今年日本的销售将继续疲软。【原文：NN Group NV expects continued sales weakness in Japan this year after its local unit was hit by a regulatory measure.】

item.title: 花旗和瑞银为竞争对手留下 500 亿美元的小额贷款机会
item.description: 从圣安东尼奥到芝加哥，在两家大银行退出后，美国市政当局正在邀请新的银行来管理借贷，这为仍在从事这项业务的公司提供了约 500 亿美元的机会。【原文：From San Antonio to Chicago, US municipalities are inviting in new rosters of banks to manage borrowings after two big players’ exits opened up a roughly $50 billion opportunity for firms that are still in the business.】

item.title: 弗雷德里克森的 Avance Gas 公司出售价值 10 亿美元的大型天然气船
item.description: Avance Gas holding Ltd.的最大股东是挪威航运业亿万富翁约翰-弗雷德里克森（John Fredriksen），该公司表示已同意将其整个超大型天然气运输船队出售给BW LPG Ltd.。【原文：Avance Gas holding Ltd., whose largest shareholder is Norwegian shipping billionaire John Fredriksen, said it has agreed to sell its entire fleet of very large gas carrying ships to BW LPG Ltd.】

item.title: 新研究称，赌徒正在抛弃股票转而投注体育运动
item.description: 随着体育博彩在美国兴起，并迅速成为一项价值数十亿美元的生意，一个令人担忧的趋势开始出现：美国人似乎正在从他们的股票经纪账户中提取资金，用于网上博彩。【原文：As sports gambling takes off in the US, turning quickly into a multi-billion dollar business, a worrisome trend is starting to emerge: Americans appear to be yanking money out of their stock-brokerage accounts to fund their online betting.】

item.title: 中国央行计划采取更多政策支持经济增长
item.description: 中国央行行长潘功胜表示，在经济努力获得增长动力之际，中国央行将计划采取更多政策来支持经济增长。【原文：China’s central bank will plan more policies to support growth, Governor Pan Gongsheng said, as the economy struggles to gain momentum.】

item.title: 丰业银行与摩根大通团队合作开展抵押贷款资本市场业务
item.description: 新斯科舍银行从摩根大通公司德克萨斯州分公司招募了一个七人团队，在休斯顿开展新的抵押贷款资本市场业务。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia has recruited a team of seven from JPMorgan Chase & Co. in Texas to launch a new mortgage capital markets business in Houston.】

item.title: 尼日利亚正在成为石油市场的巨无霸
item.description:
庞大的丹格特炼油厂确立了非洲国家的重要影响力，并有可能成为欧洲的颠覆者。【原文：

The massive Dangote refinery establishes the African nation as a major influencer — and a potential disruptor for Europe.

】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀率近两年来首次放缓
item.description: 尼日利亚的年度通货膨胀率在近两年中首次出现减速，这为因生活费用高昂而日益感到沮丧的消费者提供了一些喘息的机会。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation decelerated for the first time in almost two years, providing some respite to consumers who have become increasingly frustrated by the high cost of living.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服经过调整后利润下滑 10
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团公司在经历了结构调整和加大海外发展力度之后，3 月份的利润下降了 10%。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s profit dropped 10% in the March quarter, following a structural shakeup and ramped up efforts to grow overseas.】

item.title: 极地破冰船如何帮助美国展示经济实力
item.description: 冷战以来地缘政治竞争最激烈的时期要求美国重振其 "萎缩 "的产业政策肌肉，并设计出口管制措施，在保护本土技术的同时不削弱创新。【原文：The most intense period of geopolitical competition since the Cold War is requiring the US to regenerate its “atrophied” muscles of industrial policy and design export controls that protect homegrown technologies without dulling innovation.】

item.title: 前瑞士信贷风险主管加入 Starling Trust 担任顾问
item.description: 这位前瑞士信贷银行风险与合规主管在 2021 年的两起爆炸事件后下台，这两起事件加速了该银行的衰落，他已加入 Starling Trust 担任监管顾问。【原文：The ex-risk and compliance chief at Credit Suisse, who stepped down following the twin blow-ups in 2021 that accelerated the bank’s demise, has joined Starling Trust as a regulatory adviser.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着人们的视线转向美国劳动力市场，同时中国经济继续萎靡不振，股票期货走高。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are higher as attention turns to the US labor market, while China’s economic malaise continues. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 乌克兰谷物设施遭导弹袭击后未造成重大影响
item.description: 路易达孚公司称，该公司位于敖德萨的一处谷物设施于周三被一枚导弹击中。【原文：A Louis Dreyfus Company grain facility in Odesa was hit by a missile on Wednesday, the company said.】

item.title: 若将美联储计算在内，美国债务成本激增的情况将恶化 1,000 亿美元
item.description: 根据美国财政部公布的最新预算数字，美国政府的利息支出正在快速增长，而实际上增长得更快。【原文：Interest payments by the US government are rising fast, according to the latest budget numbers published by the Treasury — and even faster in reality.】

item.title: 德意志银行高管称 ESG 的反弹已失去威力
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）财富管理部门的一位高管表示，反 ESG 的情绪浪潮推动了全球对这一投资策略的退却，而这股浪潮现在正显示出失去动力的迹象。【原文：The wave of anti-ESG sentiment that fueled a global retreat from the investing strategy is now showing signs of losing steam, according to an executive at the wealth management arm of Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 因写字楼市场困境，瑞银将清盘传统房地产基金
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）将清算一只旗舰房地产基金，这是投资者从低迷的商业房地产市场撤资引发动荡的最新迹象。【原文：UBS Group AG will liquidate a flagship real estate fund in the latest sign of the turmoil caused by investors pulling money out of slumping commercial real estate markets.】

item.title: BayWa 在更广泛的重组前获得 5.47 亿欧元的生命线
item.description: 总部位于慕尼黑的 BayWa 股份公司已从其股东和贷款银行筹集到 5.47 亿欧元（约合 6.02 亿美元）的额外流动资金，使这家资金紧张的德国大宗商品贸易商有更多时间组织更广泛的重组。【原文：Munich-based BayWa AG has raised €547 million ($602 million) in additional liquidity from its shareholders and lender banks, giving the cash-strapped German commodities trader more time to organize a broader restructuring.】

item.title: 文件显示，Effissimo 在日本市场动荡之际买入股票
item.description: Effissimo Capital Management Pte 利用上周日本市场的历史性崩溃，增持了 UACJ Corp. 和 Sanken Electric Co.【原文：Effissimo Capital Management Pte took advantage of last week’s historic market meltdown in Japan to boost its stakes in a handful of stocks including UACJ Corp. and Sanken Electric Co.】

item.title: 津巴布韦委托开展风能研究，帮助增加发电量
item.description: 作为增加发电量努力的一部分，津巴布韦已委托对这个南部非洲国家的风力发电潜力进行研究。【原文：Zimbabwe has commissioned a study of wind-power potential in the southern African nation as part of an effort to increase electricity generation.】

item.title: 埃克萨罗公司首席执行官称南非铁路拥堵状况已经见底
item.description: 据煤炭生产商埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）称，南非糟糕的铁路运输业绩削弱了矿商的出口能力，这种情况将得到改善。【原文：South Africa’s abysmal rail performance that’s crimped the ability of miners to export output is set to improve, according to coal producer Exxaro Resources Ltd.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气成本上升表明供应担忧持续存在
item.description: 欧洲 10 月份天然气合同的投保成本高于隆冬季节的合同，这表明交易商正在为供暖季开始时可能出现的供应中断做好准备。【原文：European natural gas contracts for October became more costly to insure than those for midwinter, signaling traders are bracing for possible supply disruptions at the start of the heating season.】

item.title: 令人失望的欧元区生产率使欧洲央行面临的挑战更加复杂
item.description: 欧元区第二季度的生产率几乎没有提高，再次低于欧洲中央银行的预期--这对其将通胀率恢复到 2% 的努力是一个打击。【原文：Euro-zone productivity barely improved in the second quarter and again missed the European Central Bank’s expectations – a blow for its efforts to bring inflation back to 2%.】

item.title: 非洲最大贷款机构标准银行称利润因工商银行而下滑
item.description: 非洲资产规模最大的贷款机构标准银行集团（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）称，上半年利润下降了 2%，因为其与中国最大贷款机构的合资企业的盈利几乎减少了一半。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd., Africa’s biggest lender by assets, said first-half profit fell 2% after earnings from its joint venture with China’s largest lender almost halved.】

item.title: 菲律宾消费低迷，中央银行下调政策利率
item.description: 菲律宾近四年来首次降息，并发出了更多降息信号，因为政策制定者希望保持经济增长势头。【原文：The Philippines cut interest rates for the first time in almost four years and signaled more to come, as policymakers look to preserve the momentum of economic growth.】

item.title: 印度需求强劲，林吉特疲软，棕榈油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于全球最大买家印度的需求强劲，加上马来西亚货币走软，使得这种热带油对海外买家更具吸引力，棕榈油连续第二天走高。【原文：Palm oil advanced for a second day thanks to strong demand from the world’s biggest buyer, India, and a weaker Malaysian currency, which made the tropical oil more attractive for overseas buyers.】

item.title: 英国经济保持稳健复苏，服务业助力增长
item.description: 英国从去年的经济衰退中保持了稳定的复苏步伐，这使首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）在寻求促进经济增长和修复公共财政的过程中具备了坚实的经济基础。【原文：The UK maintained a steady pace of recovery from last year’s recession, putting Prime Minister Keir Starmer on a strong economic footing as he looks to boost growth and repair the public finances.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：指数将延续涨势至第五天
item.description: 2023年3月23日星期四，在英国圣阿坦的阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股有限公司（Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc）工厂的总装线上，一名员工在一辆阿斯顿-马丁DBX运动型多功能车（SUV）的引擎盖区域工作。在这家亏损的制造商表示将提高利润丰厚的车型（如190,000英镑（229,349美元）的DBX707运动型多用途车）的交付量之后，阿斯顿的业绩大幅飙升。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：An employee works in the bonnet area of an Aston Martin DBX sport utility vehicle (SUV) on the final assembly line at the Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc factory in St Athan, UK, on Thursday, March 23, 2023. Aston surged after the loss-making manufacturer said it’ll boost deliveries of lucrative models like the £190,000 ($229,349) DBX707 sport utility vehicle. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 病毒检测、医疗股因对 Mpox 的担忧而在全球大涨
item.description: 在世界卫生组织宣布非洲疫情为全球紧急卫生事件后，有助于抗击快速传播的麻风腮病毒株的疫苗和其他医疗产品制造商的股票上涨。【原文：Shares of vaccine and other medical product makers that can help combat a fast-spreading mpox virus strain advance, after the World Health Organization declared an outbreak in Africa a global health emergency.】
